Created in project "Mobile Application Delevopement" at Friedrich-Alexander-University Erlangen-Nuremberg, 2015. 

 · More information about MAD: 
	https://mad.cs.fau.de/
 · Sourcecode on Github: 
	https://github.com/FAU-Inf2/SMile-encryption

This application includes work from these projects: 


· Javamail-Android:
 	 License: GNU GPL v2 
 	 Link: https://code.google.com/p/javamail-android/ 
 · Material Design Icons:
 	 License: CC BY 4.0 
 	 Link: https://www.google.com/design/icons/
 · Polygon Background:

 	 Link: http://blog.spoongraphics.co.uk
 · Spongycastle:
 	 License: Adaption of MIT X11 License 
 	 Link: https://rtyley.github.io/spongycastle/
 · scmail:
 	 License: Adaption of MIT X11 License 
 	 Link: http://mvnrepository.com/artifact/com.madgag/scmail-jdk15on/1.47.0.3
 · aFileChooser:
 	 License: Apache License 2.0
 	 Link: https://github.com/iPaulPro/aFileChooser
 · Card Library:
 	 License: Apache License 2.0
 	 Link: https://github.com/gabrielemariotti/cardslib
 · joda-time-android:
 	 License: Apache License 2.0
 	 Link: https://github.com/dlew/joda-time-android
